import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductsScreen = () => { const { id:productId }=useParams(); const product=products.find((p) => ( p._id === productId )) console.log(product); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} ) } export default ProductsScreen
